title: Funding Traders 31% OFF
description: Funding Traders, based in the United Arab Emirates, was established in April 2023. It is a CFD firm offering 1 Step, 2 Steps and Instant program types. Account sizes range from $10,000 to $300,000. Platforms supported include MT5 and TradeLocker. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
forbidden_strategies: VWHT rule: Hold trades for realistic period (at least 2 mins weighted).
Max lot limit (Instant): 20 lot limit per trade.
Biggest Loss MUST NOT EXCEED Biggest Win (Instant).
Maximum risk: 1% (Instant). Max risk per idea 2% (1-Step/2-Step).

payout_policy.minimum_payout: Rise: $200. Crypto: $50. Instant: 1% of starting balance.
payout_policy.details: Instant: 3% Safety Cushion (first 3% profit not withdrawable). Profit Split: 80-90% (up to 100% add-on).

firm_rules.copy_trading: Allowed between FT accounts or from external accounts to FT. Prohibited from other traders.
firm_rules.expert_advisor: Risk/Trade management EAs allowed. AI-Generated EAs allowed if trader understands code/creation.
firm_rules.news_trading: Instant: Restricted 5 mins before/after high impact news (Hard Breach). 1-Step/2-Step Funded: Allowed, max 30% profit from news trades.
firm_rules.weekend_holding: Crypto: Prohibited for Instant (close 1 hour before Friday close). Allowed for 1-Step/2-Step.
forbidden_strategies: VWHT rule: Hold trades for realistic period (at least 2 mins weighted).
Max lot limit (Instant): 20 lot limit per trade.
Biggest Loss MUST NOT EXCEED Biggest Win (Instant).
Maximum risk: 1% (Instant). Max risk per idea 2% (1-Step/2-Step).

seo_content:
Funding Traders Technical Infrastructure

Funding Traders, based in the United Arab Emirates, was established in April 2023. It is a CFD firm offering 1 Step, 2 Steps and Instant program types. Account sizes range from $10,000 to $300,000. Platforms supported include MT5 and TradeLocker. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
